attributes.action: set national standards on licensing of taxis and private hire vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment it is down to local authorities to license vehicles and drivers which leads to differing standards dependent upon which area of the country you are in, with a set of national standards it would mean all vehicles would meet certain saftey standards and all drivers would be licensed the same and it would make the industry look more professional
